main event: A visual observation of a single circular red object moving through the sky was reported in Edgerton, Wisconsin.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on April 29, 1962, with a duration of 1.5 minutes., The object appeared to fade and disappear from view., The witness described the object as being approximately half the size of a small airplane or helicopter., No photographs were taken due to the brief nature of the sighting., The report indicates a similar sighting occurred near Edgerton on the evening of April 30, 1961.
witness description: G. Sandalen, who observed the object
